Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive/Neilian Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Neilian Drive and Wakeforest Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Wakeforest Drive continues to the north and south through the intersection with Neilian Drive, which runs east and west. On the northeast corner of the intersection, you can see the magnificent Dragon's Citadel, an odd building constructed many centuries ago, now believed to be abandoned.
